sentences.en: Chiswick church is dedicated to St Nicholas, patron saint of sailors.
sentences.cn: 奇西克教堂为水手的守护神圣尼古拉而建。

sentences.en: Every parish was named after a saint.
sentences.cn: 每个教区都以某位圣徒的名字命名。

sentences.en: Every year they put a play on at Saint Holy Cross Church.
sentences.cn: 他们每年在圣十字教堂上演一出剧目。

sentences.en: He was buried in London , at the church of Saint Pancras - in - the - Fields.
sentences.cn: 他葬在伦敦乡下的潘克拉斯.

sentences.en: I feel that she would try the patience of a saint.
sentences.cn: 我觉得圣人都能被她逼疯。

sentences.en: I hint that the faint saint painted the printer with a pint of paint.
sentences.cn: 我暗示说虚弱的圣徒用了一品脱油漆涂印刷机。

sentences.en: I've had enough—there are limits even for the patience of a saint!
sentences.cn: 我已经受够了——即使是圣人忍耐也是有限的！

sentences.en: My girlfriend is a saint to put up with me.
sentences.cn: 能够忍受我，我的女朋友真的很有耐心。

sentences.en: Myself when young did eagerly frequent Doctor and Saint.
sentences.cn: 我年轻时的确热心于和圣贤经常来往.
圣帕特里克，爱尔兰的主保圣人

sentences.en: Statues of saints lined the walls of the church.
sentences.cn: 教堂的墙边立着一排圣徒像。

sentences.en: The Dutch developed a custom by which children put out shoes which Saint Nicholas would fill with gifts when he came visiting.
sentences.cn: 荷兰人有一套自己的风俗，孩子们会将鞋子放在外面，圣诞老人到来时便会在里面装满礼品。

sentences.en: The saint had a lowly heart.
Thus , Saint Antoine in this vinous feature of his, until midday.
sentences.cn: 圣安托万就像这样一杯半盏地直喝到中午.

sentences.en: Unfortunately the public conflated fiction with reality and made her into a saint.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，公众把小说和现实混为一谈，把她当成了圣徒。

words.tran_cn: 神圣的；上天堂的；成为圣人的
德高的；圣徒一般的；气质高尚的
把…尊为圣人；正式封…为圣徒（saint的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 圣伯纳德狗（瑞士阿尔卑斯山僧侣饲养的一种狗）
圣乔治（英格兰的守护神）
圣路易斯（美国的港口城市）；圣路易斯河
圣卢西亚岛（位于东加勒比海）
圣帕特里克（爱尔兰传说中守护者）
圣保罗（美国明尼苏达州首府）；门徒保罗（BBC纪录片）
圣文森特岛（位于西印度群岛东南部）
伊夫·圣·洛朗（著名服装设计师，创立同名服装品牌）

trans.tran_cn: 圣人般的人（指特别善良、仁爱或有耐性的人），圣…（冠于人名、地名之前），（因其生死言行而被基督教会追封的）圣人，圣徒
trans.tran_en: someone who is given the title ‘saint’ by the Christian church after they have died, because they have been very good or holy
